m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Gaining After Winning Approval For Direct Car Sales in Maryland - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Gaining After Winning Approval For Direct Car Sales in Maryland By Kurumi Fukushima | 05/12/15 - 03:16 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc ( TSLA - Get Report ) are up 2.02% to $244.33 in Tuesday's trading session, after Maryland Governor Larry Hogan signed a bill allowing the electric-car maker to sell directly to consumers, Bloomberg reports. Tesla can now bypass auto dealers starting Oct. 1, and operate as many as four locations, according to the new law. About 5.45 million shares of Tesla exchanged hands as of 3:14 p.m. ET today,
